name: galaxy_control
description: game about transmitting signals across the galaxy to conquer new planets

scripts.sv: start http://localhost:3000/public/ | nodemon index.js | browser-sync start --no-open --server --files './css/**/*.css, ./js/**/*.js' --plugins C:\Users\Home\AppData\Roaming\npm\node_modules\bs-html-injector?files[]=*.html
